title: [Bug]: FileAccessData is missing Id and Correlation Id
body:
### Issue Description

Id is a per-process counter assigned to the specific access, not the file. CorrelationId is set on copy destination events to help correlate with the copy source event.

These two aren't being plumbed through from the underlying BuildXL data and are needed for [MSBuildCache](https://github.com/Microsoft/MSBuildCache) to do some copy tracing optimizations.

### Steps to Reproduce

N/A

### Expected Behavior

N/A

### Actual Behavior

N/A

### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_
